text: Bug found: if you clone a DM1 custom module in the design manager you can’t upgrade the clone. nevermind, it defaulted to being every type of module, including email which strips out the panes. might want to remove that from being a default if the module isn’t used in an email template

It looks like a new design for Content Staging just appeared in a client's portal. Liking the look, but one issue I noticed right away is that you can't actually select the checkbox at the top to "select all". Also, when you hover over a page you can't read any of the 3 edit buttons.
Hey Josh, what’s the screen resolution on that?
<@U8G91EPCL> It's on a 27" iMac 5K but my actual browser window is 1373x728 in that screenshot. At 1280x800 they don't appear at all.
woah seeing the new staging layout myself now too
Thanks for adding staged vs modified date. I feel like that didn’t exist before.
After a certain width they’re suppose to collapse into one button but it definitely needs to be changed to change over sooner. Thanks for reporting!
